org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

min_timestamp.description: The minimum timestamp to query for stats. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

max_timestamp.description: The maximum timestamp to query for stats. Defaults to the time 30 days ago. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.
